HAIR_DESCRIPTION.blunt_bob: chin-length blunt bob with sharp horizontal cut terminating precisely at jawline
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.soft_bob: soft bob with gentle rounded ends grazing collarbone
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.bobcut: asymmetric bobcut with longest point at jawline, shortest at nape
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.pixie_cut: ultra-short pixie cut with tapered sides exposing ears, crown volume only
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.tight_bun: tight bun coiled precisely at crown of head with zero stray strands
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.low_bun: low bun gathered at nape of neck with smooth wrap
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.high_bun: high bun positioned at crown with tension pull from temples
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.short_crop: short crop with textured top grazing earlobes, tapered sides
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.straight_shoulder_length: straight shoulder-length hair with ends grazing collarbone and subtle inward tuck
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.straight_shoulder_length_(pinned): straight shoulder-length hair pinned back at temples, ends grazing collarbone
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.tight_single_ponytail: tight single ponytail gathered precisely at nape with straight fall
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.high_ponytail: high ponytail gathered at crown with taut pull from temples
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.low_ponytail: low ponytail gathered at nape with relaxed fall to mid-back
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.braided_ponytail: single braided ponytail gathered at nape extending to mid-back
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.messy_bun: messy bun with intentional flyaways, base positioned at mid-occiput
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.short_coils: short coils with tight curl pattern terminating at jawline
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.medium_coils: medium coils with defined curl clumps extending to shoulders
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.afro: full afro with spherical volume extending 4 inches from scalp perimeter
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.braided_bun: braided bun with cornrow feed-in terminating in coiled crown bun
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.box_braids: waist-length box braids with uniform thickness, parting visible at scalp
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.long_straight: long straight hair with ends terminating at mid-back
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.long_wavy: long wavy hair with S-pattern waves terminating at mid-back
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.mid_length_layered: mid-length layered cut with shortest layers at jawline, longest at shoulders
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.shoulder_length_waves: shoulder-length waves with soft undulation grazing collarbone
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.long_waves: long waves with deep undulation terminating at waist
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.deep_waves: deep waves with pronounced S-pattern terminating at hips
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.tapered: tapered cut with gradual fade from temple to nape, top length 2 inches
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.short: short cut with uniform 1.5 inch length across entire head
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.buzzed: buzzed cut with #2 guard length, zero taper
HAIR_DESCRIPTION.undercut: undercut with shaved sides exposing ear contour, top length 3 inches combed forward
